entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Ivujivik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -33.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ivujivik Airport 10:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Temperature: -33.1°C
Pressure: 100.9 kPa
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -48
Dewpoint: -37.8°C
Wind: ESE 24 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 35. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 48 this evening and minus 54 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning early in the morning. Blowing snow. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 49 in the morning and minus 43 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 29.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and local blowing snow. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 29. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
